alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 7:15AM EST until March 06 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. For the Maumee River...including Grand Rapids, Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, A few riverside cabins in Waterville become threatened. Lowland flooding occurs along with some water inundation on River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.6 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 515 PM EST.
